dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HJ 46 IH: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on March 13, 2020.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gosar (for himself, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Massie, Mr. Roy, Mr. Norman, Mr. Mast, and Mr. Weber of Texas) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on March 13, 2020.

section.text: That, pursuant to section 202 of the National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C. 1622), the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on March 13, 2020, in Proclamation 9994 (85 Fed. Reg. 15337) is hereby terminated.
